A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
A film with a-lot of potential but ultimately disappointed. A brave attempt by writer-director Rian Johnson but unfortunately his filmmaking abilities did not match his ambition. 
The film does have some high points and moments that show great promise however due to the poor character development\, huge plot holes\, messy editing and some very weak performances - it makes it very hard to fully immerse yourself into the experience.
I am very confident that this is not what George Lucas would have envisioned for the final trilogy in the Skywalksr saga - and whislt I can appreciate this is no longer his franchise - I can't help feel that this film was not Star Wars.
.... But who knows\, maybe it will grow on me....
